FILL THIS FORM TO ADD LOST DOCUMENT: UZUZA IYI FISHI WINJIZA ICYANGOMBWA CYABUZE
Name: Izina
Describe how you lost your document: Sobanura uko watakaje icyangombwa cyawe muburyo burambuye
Welcome, Now It's easy to get back your: Ikaze, ubu biroroshye kubona icyangombwa cyawe cyatakaye
Lost_desc: Mbese waba wabuze icyangombwa cyawe? wikirirwa uvunika ushaka icyangombwa wenyine, shaka ibyangombwa iragufasha kubona icyangombwa cyawe, hakoreshejwe uburyo bworoshye bwo kwakira amakuru yibyabonetse byatanzwe kuri police.
Found_desc: Ese waba watoraguye icyangombwa cyundi, ihutire kugishyikiriza inzego za police zikwegereye maze shaka ibyangombwa ikoreshwe mukubishyira muri sisitemu kuburyo uwabitaye abibona bitamugoye ndetse bitamutwaye igihe kirekire.
Security_desc: Mugihe icyangombwa cyawe cyatoraguwe kigashyikirizwa inzego zibishinzwe, hari amahirwe menci yo kugisubirana Mugihe hakoreshwa serivisi za shaka ibyangombwa kuko inagufasha kubona ubutumwa bugufi (SMS) cyangwa emeyili mugihe nyiri cyangombwa yabonetse.
content-p: Sisitemu ya shaka ibyangombwa iragufasha kubona ibyangombwa byawe wabuze.
motivation-des: Uko ukora cyane kubintu runaka, niko uzumva umerewe igihe ubigezeho.
mission-des: Gufasha abaturage gusubirana ibyangomwa byatakaye muburyo bworoshye, bwiza kandi bwizewe.
vision-des: Guca burundu ibura ry'aburundu ry'ibyangombwa muri Africa.
